name: Maze of Darkness
description:
* Celebrate Halloween with Maze of Darkness! FREE for a limited time! *

* For the best experience, we strongly recommend playing with sound enabled.

Presented by Doopop

Where am I...?
What is this place?

DODGE the horrors.
ESCAPE the maze.

You will not survive.

FEATURES
- Simple yet suspenseful gameplay
- Easy swipe controls
- 20+ monsters
- Upgrade your Almanac
